text: Soni namuno (achimakafilio) tungaatuluchisye Malaika (kwisa kuŵichila umboni yautume wenu), nombe ŵawe nikwaŵechetekasya (pakwagumbalichisya umboni), ni kwasonganganyichisya chindu chilichose pameso pao, nganganaŵa ŵanti nikulupilila ikaŵeje Allah ali asachile, nambo kuti ŵajinji mwa ŵanganyao ali muujinga
